name: Zombie vs Zombies
description:
This game was made in 24 hours for WeeklyGameJam 203.

Zombie vs Zombies is a short silly game where you play as a Zombie who is incapacitated. You must try to defend yourself from other tiny zombies by eating them. 

Controls: Mouse over specific enemies to eat them!

Made using Unity,  Blender,  Photoshop and AudacityColor palette by Imphenzia
